item.title: Designing the Hyperspace Compass
item.description: A Hyperspace Compass is a device designed for hyperspace travel prior to the advent of the astronavigational computer.
item.content:encoded: A Hyperspace Compass is a device designed for hyperspace travel prior to the advent of the astronavigational computer.
